title-english: Activities of Daughter of the Nile
creator: Bint Al Nil
description-english: This article is about a branch for the French Marie Curie Association that was newly established by Madame Sarvarian. The Association is dedicated to preparing girls for practical life.
description-arabic: تتحدث المقالة عن الفرع الذي افتتحته مدام سارفاريان لجماعة (ماري كوري) الفرنسية. ومن أهم مقاصد هذه الجمعية تربية الفتيات وإعدادهن لمجابهة الحياة العملية.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
